name: Fungi, Void Fungus
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, poisoned
languages: understands Common and Void Speech but can't speak, telepathy 60'

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: 2 Poisonous Mycelium or Psychic Blasts. If it hits one creature with both Blasts target charmed 1 min (DC 13 Cha negates) and can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.

actions.name: Poisonous Mycelium
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 6 (1d8+2) piercing damage + 7 (2d6) poison and poisoned until end of its next turn (DC 13 Con not poisoned.)

actions.name: Psychic Blast
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, 60 ft., one target, 12 (2d8+3) psychic.

actions.name: Consume Energy
actions.desc: Hair-like tendrils dangling from its cap flash as it draws psychic energy from creature it can see within 30' of it. Target 18 (4d8) psychic (DC 13 Cha half). Fungus regains equal hp.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While motionless indistinguishable from patch of glowing fungus.

special_abilities.name: Illumination
special_abilities.desc: Sheds dim light in a 10 ft. radius.
